page.description: Insert entries into array, resize the array if needed.
page.original:
&ltARRAY>.INSERT() Syntax &ltARRAY>.INSERT( Position as N, Count as N ) Object_Address.Choice.List.Insert( Position as N, Count as N ) ArgumentDescription Object_AddressThe address of a list or combo box on a form. PositionThe number of the first element to insert. CountThe number of elements to insert.
Description The &ltARRAY>.INSERT() method inserts Count entries in a single dimensional array starting at Position. If necessary, the array is resized to accommodate the additional entries. Example Assume an array "A" contains the following elements: ElementValue A[1]Orange A[2]Banana A[3]Apple A[4]Pineapple A.INSERT(2,2) ? A ElementValue A[1]Orange A[2] A[3] A[4]Banana A[5]Apple A[6]Pineapple
See Also Array Functions and Methods
